summary: MY ENGINE SEIZED WHILE DRIVING IN 2016  IT WAS REPLACED AS IT WAS DEFECTIVE AT 45,000 MILES NOW 2018 THE ENGINE HAS BASICALLY DONE THE SAME THING WITH 54,000 MILES UNABLE TO DRIVE HAD TO WAIT 2 DAYS FOR TKIA TO DETERMINE IF I WAS AT FUALT OR THE ENGINE ITSELF  FINALLY DETERMINED IT WAS KIA FAULT TO BE REPLACED AGAIN DUE TO DEFECT AFTER READING OTHER CONSUMERS REPORTS THEY HAVE HAD PROBLEMS WITH THEIR ENGINES SEIZING, CATCHING FIRE ETC
